author: Nadan
text: What great service! Took 3 days from the moment I first messaged till I got the kite (switchblade 12m) back all ready to go (with three pinholes on the leading edge all sealed and fixed). Was picked up and delivered straight to my door. Totally recommend it! Thanks sooooo much!

author: Moritz
text: Dimitry is extremely responsive and friendly and very fast with his repairs! Definitely recommend.

author: Frank
text: Fast repair and top quality. Back on the water the next day!

author: Luis
text: Valve replacement was perfect. Great communication.

author: Nick
text: Clean canopy stitch, barely visible. Highly recommend.

author: Martyn
text: Burst strut bladder repaired quickly—great service. Thanks!
